name: Student Result Management System
viewDetail: A comprehensive role-based student result management platform with dashboards for admins, teachers, and students. Secure authentication, CRUD for student records, and real-time result updates. Backend APIs built with Express.js and data stored in MongoDB. Frontend with ReactJS and Tailwind CSS for responsive UI.

name: Boat Management System
viewDetail: Full-stack boat management with real-time GPS tracking and QR-based life jacket distribution. Role-based access (admin, inspectors, boat operators), pilot registration, inspections, and geolocation monitoring. Responsive UI using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS.

name: Payment Pay
viewDetail: MERN payment app featuring transaction history, REST APIs, and MongoDB for user profiles and transactions. Built with ReactJS and Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive interface.
